amendment.description: Amendment permits States to approve grants to local school districts only if the district is not in violation of State law regarding the education of English language learners.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered two and printed in the Congressional Record to permit states to approve grants to local school districts only if the district is in compliance with State law regarding the education of English language learners.

action.text: On agreeing to the Riggs amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 184 (Roll No. 423).
